bike.description: This is a great starter bike, perfect for daily commuting, trips around town, weekend rides. Heritage conventional diamond frame, handcrafted in Chicago with American High-Tensile steel. •1-speed coaster brake hub •Velo-Orange leather saddle •Alloy mustache handlebars •Natural Cork grips •Schwalbe Delta Cruiser tires with K-Guard® •Weinmann Alloy Wheelset Customize Your Chief!
